Text: This is a fantastic collection. Not terribly fond of Charles Dickens myself, but I love Frankenstein and Dracula.
Thanks for this treasure trove of immortal books.Dickens,Austen,Bronte,Twain,Hardy,.....the infinite wisdom in their books.But many gems are still missing.
Not fond of Dickens?? I guess there are some types of people who can only reach the height of popcorn movies.
